Class AdmRemoteImpBESA

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
BESA.Remote.AdmRemoteImpBESA
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdmRemoteInterfaceBESA, Serializable, Remote
public class AdmRemoteImpBESA extends UnicastRemoteObject implements AdmRemoteInterfaceBESA, Serializable
This class implements the mechanisms for the handling of RPC.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:

      public void registerRemoteAgents(String agAlias, String agId, String admId)

      Creates the aid card.

      Does the agent lookup.

    • registerRemoteAdm

      public void registerRemoteAdm(String admId, String admAlias, String ipAddress, int rmiPort) throws RemoteException
      Makes the registry of an remote BESA administrator.
      Specified by:
      registerRemoteAdm in interface AdmRemoteInterfaceBESA
      Parameters:
      admAlias - Alias/name of the admnistrador.
      ipAddress - The IP address of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
      rmiPort - The port of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.

      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • registerRemoteAgent

      public boolean registerRemoteAgent(String password, String administratorName, String aid) throws RemoteException
      Makes the remote registry of an agent in a BESA container.

      Creates the aid card.

      Does the agent lookup.
      Specified by:
      registerRemoteAgent in interface AdmRemoteInterfaceBESA
      Parameters:
      password - Password of the local administrator.
      administratorName - Name of the administrator.
      aid - Is a chain formed of the following way: IP + "." + port + "." + aid.
      Returns:
      true if the registry can be made; false otherwise.

      The registry of the agent can fail if the name of the administrator is not registered in the administrators table or if appears problems when doing the lookup (IP of the remote admnistrador, port of the remote administrator, aid).
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • unregisterRemoteAgent

      public void unregisterRemoteAgent(String password, String administratorName, String aid) throws RemoteException
      Eliminates the remote registry of an agent. To do this, a null value is asigned to the aid card.
      Specified by:
      unregisterRemoteAgent in interface AdmRemoteInterfaceBESA
      Parameters:
      password - Password of the local administrator.
      administratorName - Name assigned to the administrator.
      aid - The identifier of the agent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.
